description:
{RHelp Topic{W: Nephium{x

Nephium is the God of Death. He seems to have little character, and rarely
shows emotion. He is not bent on bringing death to the world, but to purge
the old and stagnant so that there is room for new life. He also despises
the undead charging his followers to destroy any and all they come across.
It is said that he and Aludra were once lovers, but currently there seems to
be no romantic relationship between them. He is known to work, at times,
with Malyki and Caerdik when he deems it necessary, but never at the same
time seeing as how they don't get along with each other. Sirian and
Admanthos are his greatest enemies. Nephium's followers specialize in
turning and destroying undead. They do have the ability to ressurect, but
rarely do so as it is too close to violating their beliefs about raising
undead.
